message: Starting integration analysis - examining existing ALD system architecture and components
Designing integration strategy - analyzing compatibility requirements and migration path based on other agents' findings
Deployed child agents for migration strategy and API compatibility - now designing monitoring and observability integration
Synthesizing comprehensive integration plan based on all agent findings - critical security, performance, and architecture issues identified

INTEGRATION MISSION COMPLETE: Comprehensive 4-phase integration strategy delivered with zero-downtime migration plan, backward compatibility framework, and coordinated solutions from 16 specialist agents addressing all critical security, performance, and architecture issues
